message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to start.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. I'm proposing a 60/40 split instead.  Think it over carefully, as the value decreases with each round.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly before inflation eats away at the value.
